description:
==========================================================

Memsoftware for Spectrum

THE BUILDER (The builder) - 10 Lines in Basic -

==========================================================

==========================================================

INTRO

==========================================================

In the builder you assume the role of carrier, which You must move as many yellow bricks as possible to the White House. To do so, he will use the white brick, which it will serve to push the yellows.

On your way you must not crash any of the bricks against the houses or the red limits. Play to make as many points as possible.

==========================================================

MOVEMENT

==========================================================

The movement will be made with:

Q:Up

Down

O:Left

Q: right

EL CONSTRUCTOR - 10 Lineas en Basic -

==========================================================

==========================================================

INTRO

==========================================================

En el constructor usted asume el rol de transportista, el cual debe trasladar tantos ladrillos amarillos como sea posible hasta la casa blanca. Para hacerlo se valdrá del ladrillo blanco, el cual servirá para empujar los amarillos.

En su camino no debe chocar ninguno de los ladrillos contra las casas rojas ni los límites rojos. Juega a realizar la mayor cantidad de puntos posibles.

==========================================================

MOVIMIENTO

==========================================================

El movimiento se realizará con:

Q:Arriba

A:Abajo

O:Izquierda

P:Derecha
